DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyse acute chronic effect two aerobic-training model perform water dry land cardiorespiratory , functional , metabolic , hormonal quality-of-life parameter patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Chronic Effects Two Aerobic-training Models Performed Water Dry Land Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) .
DOC.criteria: The clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus . Not perform regular systematic physical exercise least three month . Uncontrolled hypertension . Autonomic neuropathy . Severe peripheral neuropathy . Proliferative diabetic retinopathy . Severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy . Uncompensated heart failure . Peripheral amputation . Chronic renal failure ( GFR MDRD < 30 ) . Muscle joint injury prevents physical exercise .
